Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Skin Diseases, Viral/Molluscum Contagiosum
Virus Diseases/DNA Virus Infections/Poxviridae Infections/Molluscum Contagiosum
Record.Description: A common, benign, usually self-limited viral infection of the skin and occasionally the conjunctivae by a poxvirus (MOLLUSCUM CONTAGIOSUM VIRUS). (Dorland, 27th ed)
